data.message: Hey em, you were the best until you started to wear depends,hooting and Hollering , like your words mattered to us of the old gen.You just another liberal chump that bashes our leader,make America great again, you wife beater.suck it up, go about your day,you were only good back in the hay day.You’re old as dirt,over the hill artist,that lost more fans than Hillary Clinton’s advisor. Shut the fuck up with your lame ass rhymes,you just a drug addict chump who watched his game go bye,bye. So suck it up,realize trump is your master,or you will lose more fans faster n faster.End of the story is, there’s only one good thing about you, and that’s mgk bending over your gorgeous daughter.✌️

replies.message: Your president is a pedophile and a sexual predator just like you, inbred hick.
You are very ignorant. I’m a hick because i hunt ? Sexual predator when i have two children? Inbred? Clearly you’re a very deranged individual.your parents should be ashamed of you!
Says the guy who defends and elects sexual predators.
Matt Hopkins i didn’t vote for trump. I was trying to be sarcastic with my stupid lyrics. I think em is best rapper ever. But he should stay out of politics
